comment.author: 7668206@N03
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Maine Photography, and we'd love to have your photo added to the group. These are really wonderful! I hope you'll post to our group...historical pictures are so much more interesting :)

comment.author: 7205704@N03
comment._content: I can't believe these guys (the CAP) got to hand drop bombs out of these planes patrolling for German subs in WWII..
